Title: NightLights
Writer: Nick Izzo (screenplay), Adam Dick (screenplay), David Midell (story)
Actors: Shawna Waldron, Stephen Louis Grush, Kate Black-Spence, Leslie Easterbrook
Plot: Erin Logan lives with and provides for her twin brother Jacob, who is severely affected by autism. After she stumbles into chances for love and friendship, she is forced to confront what it...
